alert.note: Alert for Grant; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:26PM CDT until June 16 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR GRANT AND SOUTHEASTERN SALINE COUNTIES... At 325 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Prattsville, or near Sheridan, moving southeast at 40 mph. This storm has a history of producing severe sized hail, most recently in southern Saline County. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sheridan... Traskwood... Leola... Tull... Prattsville... Poyen... Cane Creek... Thiel... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Dogwood... Belfast... Ain... Cross Roads in Grant County... Fenter... Slabtown... Shaw... Prague... Buie... Ico... Center Grove... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
